1.instruction: Determine whether each argument is valid or invalid. Using truth tables would be good practice for the test
questions: \(A \wedge B, A \to B, B \to A \vDash A \leftrightarrow B\)
\(A \vee B, A \to B, B \to A \vDash A \wedge B\)
\((B\wedge A)\to C, (C\wedge A) \to B\vDash (C \wedge B)\to A\)

\(
eg (
eg A \vee 
eg B), A 	o 
eg C \vDash A 	o (B 	o C)\)
